backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing user-submitted contact messages keyed by Principal with submit, query, and retrieval functions plus static cafe info.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing job-related feature requirements, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose, styling, and roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme CSS defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with meta tags, favicon, root mount, and module script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up hash-based routing with site layout and routes for home, about, services, contact, and jobs pages.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form with validation, backend submission hooks, success/error states, and conditional UI.
frontend/src/components/contact/MapEmbed: Renders an iframe map embed using the cafe's configured map URL.
frontend/src/components/contact/WhatsApp: Button linking to WhatsApp chat using the cafe's configured number.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with headline, CTAs, and an illustration promoting digital services.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesPre: Preview grid of service categories showing a few items each with a link to the full services page.
frontend/src/components/home/WhyChooseUs: Renders a feature grid highlighting service advantages with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobCard.tsx: Displays job details with badges, metadata, and an apply button with official link validation.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobCardSkel: Provides a skeleton placeholder UI for loading job cards.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Generates a grid of service categories and their items using data from servicesData.
frontend/src/components/site/Container.t: Wrapper component that applies consistent responsive container styling.
Renders footer with cafe info, quick links, contact details, and social media icons.
Creates a responsive header with navigation links, a logo, and mobile menu support.
Defines the main site layout including header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/config/cafeInfo.ts: Stores static cafe information such as name, contact details, and map embed URL.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Provides social media links, including a WhatsApp link generated from cafe info.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines service categories and items used to populate the services grid.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobs.ts: React Query hook that fetches government jobs via fetchGovernmentJobs with caching, retries, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching cafe info, submitting contact forms, checking contact status, and retrieving all contacts through an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes with typography and accessibility adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/jobs/govJobModel.ts: Defines the GovernmentJob interface representing normalized government job data for UI use.
frontend/src/lib/jobs/govJobsClient.ts: Simulates fetching government job listings by returning a delayed static dataset of normalized job entries.
frontend/src/lib/jobs/jobFiltering.ts: Provides pure functions to filter jobs by keyword or category and extract predefined categories.
frontend/src/lib/jobs/officialDomains.ts: Defines an allowlist of official government domains and utilities to validate job apply URLs.
frontend/src/lib/jobs/remotiveClient.ts: Empty placeholder module for future Remotive job fetching logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata, mission/vision sections, and styled informational content about the cafe.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with SEO metadata, cafe contact details, business hours, a contact form, WhatsApp button, and a map placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with SEO metadata, hero and services preview sections, a CTA area, and WhatsApp/contact links.
frontend/src/pages/JobsPage.tsx: Implements the government jobs listing page with search, category filtering, pagination, error handling, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays the services overview page with SEO metadata, a services grid, and a custom-service inquiry section.
frontend/src/seo/Seo.tsx: Manages dynamic page titles and meta tags, including Open Graph, Twitter cards, and LocalBusiness JSON-LD.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project configuration, requirements, features, and architectural notes for the government jobs site build.
